Package model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.User
  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The class User which has methods to buy stock, create portfolio, evaluate portfolio, calculate cost basis and view composition of the portfolio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      User()
      Instantiates a new User and the portfolios hash map.

      • saveStrategy

        public void saveStrategy​(java.lang.String strategyNumber,
                         double investmentAmount,
                         java.lang.String startDate,
                         java.lang.String endDate,
                         int frequency)
        Method to save strategy to a csv file. Saves the strategy in the format investment amount, start date, end date, frequency.
        Parameters:
        strategyNumber - is the name of the strategy the user wishes to save.
        investmentAmount - is the investment amount.
        startDate - is the strategy start date.
        endDate - is the strategy end date.
        frequency - is the frequency for the strategy.
